title: Russia to use yuan from its forex reserves, finance minister says - Reuters.com
content:
1. Russia to use yuan from its forex reserves, finance minister says  Reuters.com
  2. Russia Lost Access to Half Its Reserves, Finance Minister Says  Bloomberg

description: Russia will use Chinese yuan from its foreign exchange reserves after Western sanctions blocked Moscow's access to the U.S. dollars and euros in the reserves, Finance Minister Anton Siluanov said on Monday.
